skills.title: Developer
skills.statement: I value clean and efficient code through thoughtful development and vetting. I have built several projects, contributed to open source projects, and developed enterprise applications.

skills.title: DevOps
skills.statement: I enjoy orchestrating deployments, automating processes, and increasing effeciency. I have experience in managing deployments and maintaining uptime for 'always-on' applications.

skills.title: IT Professional
skills.statement: I am able to understand technology and explain it in easy to understand terms. I have managed servers and workstations at an enterprise scale, configured rolling updates, and maintained compliant by government standards.
